short.ar: نقرة واحدة لاستخراج العملاء المحليين للشركات من الخرائط وتصدير المعلومات إلى ملفات إكسيل/CSV.
short.am,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: One click to extract B2B Local leads from Maps and export leads to Excel/CSV files.
short.bn: এক ক্লিকে মানচিত্র থেকে B2B স্থানীয় লিড সংগ্রহ করুন এবং লিডগুলি এক্সেল / সিএসভি ফাইলে রপ্তানি করুন।
short.de: Mit einem Klick B2B lokale Leads von Maps extrahieren und Leads in Excel/CSV-Dateien exportieren.
short.es: Un clic para extraer clientes potenciales locales B2B de Maps y exportarlos a archivos de Excel/CSV.
short.fr: Un clic pour extraire des leads B2B locaux à partir de Maps et exporter les leads vers des fichiers Excel/CSV.
short.hi: एक क्लिक से बी2बी स्थानीय लीड्स को मानचित्र से निकालें और लीड्स को Excel/CSV फ़ाइल में निर्यात करें।
short.id: Satu kali klik untuk mengekstrak prospek lokal B2B dari Peta dan mengekspor prospek ke file Excel/CSV.
short.it: Un clic per estrarre lead locali B2B da Maps e esportare i lead in file Excel/CSV.
short.ja: マップからB2Bローカルリードを抽出し、リードをExcel/CSVファイルにエクスポートするためのワンクリック。
short.ko: 맵에서 B2B 로컬 리드를 추출하고 리드를 Excel/CSV 파일로 내보내는 데 한 번의 클릭만 필요합니다.
short.mr: B2B स्थानिक लिड्सचा प्रमाणित करण्यासाठी एक क्लिक करा आणि ते Excel/CSV फाईलमध्ये निर्यात करा.
short.nl: Met één klik B2B Local leads extraheren uit Maps en leads exporteren naar Excel/CSV-bestanden.
short.ru: Один клик для извлечения B2B локальных лидов с карт и экспорта лидов в файлы Excel/CSV.
short.sv: Ett klick för att extrahera B2B-lokala leads från kartor och exportera leads till Excel/CSV-filer.
short.sw: Bonyeza moja kwa moja kuchuja B2B Nafasi za kienyeji kutoka kwenye Ramani na kusafirisha nafasi kwenye faili za Excel/CSV.
short.ta: ஒரு கிளிக்கில் மேப்ஸ் இலக்கங்களில் B2B உள்ளாட்சிகளை எடுத்து எக்ஸெல்/சி.எஸ்.வி கோப்புக்கு ஏற்றுமதி செய்பவர்கள்.
short.te: మాప్ల నుండి B2B లోకల్ లీడ్స్‌ను కలెక్ట్ చేయడానికి ఒక నొక్కు. లీడ్స్‌ను ఎక్సెల్ / CSV ఫైళ్ళకు ఎగుమతి చేయండి.
short.tr: Bir tıklama ile Haritalardan B2B Yerel iş müşterilerini çıkarın ve müşterileri Excel/CSV dosyalarına aktarın.
short.vi: Một cú nhấp để trích xuất nguồn khách hàng B2B địa phương từ bản đồ và xuất nguồn khách hàng thành tệp Excel/CSV.
short.zh_CN: 一键从地图提取B2B本地销售线索并将线索导出为Excel / CSV文件。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
This tool enables you to extract local business leads from Bing Maps with ease, including phone numbers, websites, email addresses, social media links, and physical addresses. With just one search on Bing Maps, this scraper automatically extracts the business data you need. You can even export the results to a CSV or Excel file with a single click.

Features:
✅   Extracts business name, phone numbers, website URLs, email addresses, social media links, physical addresses, from search results pages.
✅   Automatically paginates to retrieve all search results.
✅   Collects local leads when you search or move in the maps.
✅   Export results to CSV/XLSX.

How to Use:
Please refer to our tutorial video on YouTube: https://youtu.be/0rQwP8sg_Cw

Is it Free?
Yes, it's completely free! You can access basic functionalities or upgrade for more features.

Feedback and Support:
If you have any questions or need support, please contact us here: https://forms.gle/xoxBChMwnH4PMECH8

Privacy and Security:
We take your privacy seriously. All data scraped are processed locally and will never be transmitted to our servers. We do not keep your data.

Statement:
Please note that Bing Maps is a trademark of Microsoft Inc. This Scraper is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Microsoft, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
